trans-unit.source:
\n

Indicates the priority that the system associates with a process.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This value, together with the priority value of each thread of the process, determines each thread's base priority level.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx$x xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies that the process has priority above Idle but below Normal.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx $xxxxxx$Xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxx xxxxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies that the process performs time-critical tasks that must be executed immediately, such as the Task List dialog, which must respond quickly when called by the user, regardless of the load on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx$ xxxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxx Xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx$ xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The threads of the process preempt the threads of normal or idle priority class processes.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies that the threads of this process run only when the system is idle, such as a screen saver.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx$ xxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The threads of the process are preempted by the threads of any process running in a higher priority class.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies that the process has no special scheduling needs.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies that the process has the highest possible priority.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
